title: Need Help Installing on Different Computer!!!
body: Hey, So I'm not a computer fanatic but my brother is so he put together a computer and here I am. Anyways i have previously played on a laptop and that works fine but as i try install league on the H: Drive (Because it's the storage drive and my c: is a SSD with limited space). I have tried repetitively uninstalling and reinstalling but it (after windows installer) gets about 30% through the League logo and load bar (before the patcher opens) then closes i check the task manager and nothings open so i reopen league and it opens in task manager but does nothing (it stacks in task manager eg. if i open it 3 times after it fails the first time there are 4 tasks that open at the same time). If anyone need bonus details just ask but just wondering if i could receive some help <3 <3 <3

replies.body: Edit: All fixed it was my anti virus {{summoner:3}}
